## UGent courses

Since 2023, I teach practical lessons in the following courses
at Ghent University:

- [C003709A - Evolutionary Biology](https://github.com/almeidasilvaf/CompEvoBio), Master's program in Bioinformatics
- [C000500A - Bioinformatics 2](https://github.com/almeidasilvaf/BIOINF2), Master's program in Biochemistry and Biotechnology.
